pr_title: Migrates Elasticsearch demo images to OSS license

timeline.message:
Migrates Elasticsearch test images to OSS license

This uses OSS license for Elasticsearch 6 and 7, reducing the size of
the images. Image size is further reduced in 7 by using a recent change
to our JRE that allows Thai segmentation support (module jdk.localedata)

This also reduces test execution time by only executing the 7.8+ schema
test vs the entire suite again.

I think the easy verification is to add a debug statement and see if Armeria already logged it's flags-related stuff, if so too late. If not, it should work :)
Agree with the sentiment of not mucking with build, but for five lines maybe it's still worth not worrying about ordering issues
http://maven.apache.org/surefire/maven-surefire-plugin/examples/system-properties.html
<plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.0.0-M5</version>
        <configuration>
          <systemPropertyVariables>
            <propertyName>propertyValue</propertyName>
